name: There is no cap, ILY
description: $ILY stands for I Love You - but it’s more than just a phrase. It’s a movement born from the heart of the Jupiverse, designed to remind us all of the power of connection, kindness, and limitless potential Inspired by a legendary meme that echoed across our community - “There is no cap, ILY” - this coin captures the emotional energy of Web3 in its purest form. In a sea of speculation and speed, $ILY is our signal that feelings matter, and words carry weight Why $ILY? There is no cap - Not just on marketcap, but on meaning. On love. On what we’re building together It’s timeless-“I love you” transcends language, borders, and barriers. It’s instantly understood by all PPP mindset-Player Pump Player. We rise by lifting others. Every token sent is a spark of encouragement, momentum, and shared belief Built in the Jupiverse - Powered by Jupiter and launched via Jup Studio, $ILY is forged in the same spirit that made us the most vibrant corner of Solana
